Trade/Device Name(s): CoaguSense Self-Test Prothrombin Time/INR Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CoaguSense Self-Test PT/INR Monitoring System meter
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Clot detection (mechanical/optical with rotating spoked wheel and infrared light beam)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CoaguSense Self-Test PT/INR Monitoring System for self-testing of prothrombin time and INR in capillary whole blood using a portable meter.
Indications for Use Summary: Provides quantitative prothrombin time (PT) and INR results using capillary whole blood for self-testing by warfarin-anticoagulated patients or their caregivers as directed by a physician; not for screening purposes.
